trans-unit.source: Contains information that enables a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to resolve a data binding to either the property of an object or the property of the current object in a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene le informazioni che consentono a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> di risolvere un'associazione dati nella proprietà di un oggetto o nella proprietà dell'oggetto corrente in un elenco di oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is created from the string passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> viene creato dalla stringa passata per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> for each control on a form.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene stampato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> per ogni controllo in un form.

trans-unit.source: A navigation path that resolves to either the property of an object or the property of the current object in a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di navigazione che viene risolto nella proprietà di un oggetto o nella proprietà dell'oggetto corrente in un elenco di oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is created automatically when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor with a control-property name, data source, and navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> viene creato automaticamente quando si chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> costruttore con un nome di proprietà di controllo, l'origine dati e percorso di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: The `dataMember` parameter contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> string.
trans-unit.target: Il `dataMember` parametro contiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> stringa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property name of the data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della proprietà dell'oggetto con associazione a dati.

trans-unit.source: The property name of the data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della proprietà dell'oggetto con associazione a dati.

trans-unit.source: This can be an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Può essere una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> is the last item found in the navigation path returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> è l'ultimo elemento trovato nel percorso di navigazione come risultato la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is created that has a `dataMember` parameter of "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> will return "OrderDate".
trans-unit.target: Se, ad esempio, un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> viene creato ha un `dataMember` parametro di "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> restituirà "OrderDate".

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> on a form, and prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> property values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene Ottiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> di ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> in un form e vengono visualizzati il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> i valori delle proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the information that is used to specify the property name of the data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le informazioni utilizzate per specificare il nome della proprietà dell'oggetto con associazione a dati.

trans-unit.source: An empty string (""), a single property name, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to the property name of the final data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Stringa vuota (""), nome di una singola proprietà o gerarchia di nomi di proprietà delimitati da punti che vengono risolti nel nome della proprietà dell'oggetto finale con associazione a dati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is created automatically when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor with a control-property name, data source, and navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> viene creato automaticamente quando si chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A> costruttore con un nome di proprietà di controllo, l'origine dati e percorso di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: The `dataMember` parameter contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> string.
trans-unit.target: Il `dataMember` parametro contiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> stringa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> is the period delimitated combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> è la combinazione di delimitata da punti di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> valori.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is created by using a `dataMember` parameter of "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> will return "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> viene creato utilizzando un `dataMember` parametro di "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> restituirà "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate".

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> object of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> on a form, and prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> property values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Nel codice seguente vengono ottenuti i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> oggetto di ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> in un form e vengono visualizzati il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> i valori delle proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property name, or the period-delimited hierarchy of property names, that comes before the property name of the data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della proprietà o la gerarchia di nomi di proprietà delimitata da punti che precede il nome della proprietà dell'oggetto con associazione a dati.

trans-unit.source: The property name, or the period-delimited hierarchy of property names, that comes before the data-bound object property name.
trans-unit.target: Nome della proprietà o gerarchia di nomi di proprietà delimitata da punti che precede il nome della proprietà dell'oggetto con associazione a dati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> is the period delimitated combination of property names that comes before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> in the navigational path returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> è la combinazione delimitata da punti della proprietà di nomi che precede il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A> nel percorso di navigazione restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is created that has a `dataMember` parameter of "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> will return "Customers.custToOrders".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> viene creato ha un `dataMember` parametro di "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate", <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> restituirà "CustToOrders".

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> on a form, and prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> property values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene Ottiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> di ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> in un form e vengono visualizzati il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> i valori delle proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare per l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato è uguale a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="otherObject" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> and both <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember" /> strings are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="otherObject" /> è un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> ed entrambe le stringhe di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember" /> sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> strings are compared with a culture setting of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> le stringhe vengono confrontate con le impostazioni cultura di <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> da confrontare per l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> da confrontare per l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember" /> strings for <paramref name="a" /> and <paramref name="b" /> are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le stringhe di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember" /> per <paramref name="a" /> e <paramref name="b" /> sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Prima classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> da confrontare per determinare la differenza.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Seconda classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> da confrontare per determinare la differenza.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo" /> non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember" /> strings for <paramref name="a" /> and <paramref name="b" /> are not equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le stringhe di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember" /> per <paramref name="a" /> e <paramref name="b" /> non sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
